doc.after: Written Chinese has a long history of creating new characters by merging parts or wholes of other Chinese characters However a few of these combinations do not represent morphemes but retain the original multi character multiple morpheme reading and are therefore not considered true characters themselves In Chinese these ligatures are called h w n or h sh see polysyllabic Chinese characters for more
